parameters.name: BindId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the honeypot to which the probe is bound.

parameters.name: BindPortList
parameters.description: The ports that are bound to the probe.

parameters.name: BindType
parameters.description:
The operation that the probe performs. Valid values:

*   **forward_honey**: forward traffic to a honeypot
*   **scan_port**: monitor and scan

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: HoneypotId
parameters.description:
The honeypot ID.

>  You can call the [ListHoneypot](~~ListHoneypot~~) operation to obtain the IDs of honeypots.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The port ID of the probe service.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned per page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: ProbeId
parameters.description:
The probe ID.

>  You can call the [ListHoneypotProbe](~~ListHoneypotProbe~~) operation to query the IDs of probes.

parameters.name: ServiceIpList
parameters.description: The IP addresses that are monitored.
